name: Slate Admin Theme
author: Ryan Sommers

sections.description:
Slate provides a clean, simplified design for your WordPress Admin area.

Our goal was to simplify the visual design with a primary focus on the content writing experience.

If you like Slate, please consider leaving a review here on WordPress. Thank you!
sections.installation:
1. Unzip slate-admin-theme.zip
  2. Upload the slate-admin-theme' folder to the/wp-content/plugins/` directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Why doesn’t something look right?

This is my first admin theme, and given all the various states and pages there are, there’s a good chance I’ve missed some stuff. Please just submit a support ticket if you run into anything wacky.
sections.changelog:
1.2.4

  • Styling updates for WordPress 5.9.
  • Removes post state from Customzier and Menus
  • Styling fixes for Elementor and WooCommerce

1.2.3

  • Styling updates for WordPress 5.5.

1.2.2

  • Styling updates for WordPress 5.4.

1.2.1

  • Styling updates for WordPress 5.1.

1.2

  • Minor bug fixes.

1.1.9

  • Compatibility update for WordPress 5.0+ and Gutenberg.

1.1.8

  • Compatibility update for WordPress 4.8 and 4.9.

1.1.7

  • Compatibility update for WordPress 4.5, 4.6, and 4.7.

1.1.6

  • Compatibility update for WordPress 4.4.

1.1.5

  • Compatibility update for WordPress 4.3.

1.1.4

  • Fixed a bug regarding hidden post titles for Subscriber roles.

1.1.3

  • Increased compatibility with some 3rd party plugins and custom metaboxes.
  • Minor bug fixes.

1.1.2

  • Minor CSS fix for deleted posts list.

1.1.1

  • Added support for WordPress 4.1
  • Other bug fixes.

1.1

  • Added user profile colors
  • Fixes for Jetpack

1.0.8

  • Minor CSS fixes.

1.0.7

  • Fixed minor CSS issue introduced in last update.

1.0.6

  • Fixed minor CSS issue.
  • Changed a function name.

1.0.5

  • Added compatibility with the Obvious Post States plugin.
  • Changed how jQuery is called in slate.js.
  • Moved screenshots to assets folder.
  • Changed post state styling in CSS.

1.0.4

  • Admin menu bug fixes.
  • Added styles to Comments page.

1.0.3

  • Minor CSS fix to the admin menu.
  • Updates to readme.txt.

1.0.2

  • Added new Login page styles.

1.0.1

  • Added new Dashboard styles.
  • Removed jQuery UI.

1.0

  • Initial release.
